roleset.name: give, associate with
roleset.note: ASSIGN-V NOTES: Verbnet entry 13.3, other framed members include allocate, award, concede, grant, promise and vote. Comparison to those. No Framenet entry. (from assign.01-v)
ASSIGNMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on assign.01, ON grouping assignment-n senses 1, 2, 3,& 6; maps to VN class future_having-13.3. Framed by Claire. (from assignment.01-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: It also owns Moody's Investors Service, which *trace*-1 assigns credit-ratings to bonds and preferred stock; A.C. Nielsen, known for its data on television-viewing patterns, and Yellow-pages publisher Donnelley.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: RJR Nabisco Inc. awarded its national broadcast media-buyingassignment to FCB/Leber Katz Partners , the New York outpost ofChicago-based Foote , Cone& Belding .
example.arg: to FCB/Leber Katz Partners , the New York outpost of Chicago-based Foote , Cone& Belding

example.name: NP only, args 1 & 2
example.text: Mr. Boyd 's first directorial assignment as the theater 's newartistic director
example.arg: as the theater 's new artistic director

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: Mary goes over her son's homework assignments every night.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Their assignment of the railroad's holdings to the creditors was very complicated.

example.name: Args 1, 2, new semantics
example.text: The assignment of the right name to this new product is very important.
